text: Liliana Berezowsky (born April 22, 1944) is a Canadian artist known for her public sculptures. ==Early life and education== She was born in Krakow and emigrated to Canada in 1948. She studied at Concordia University, receiving a BFA degree in 1984 and a Master of Fine Arts degree in 1989. ==Collections== Her work is included in the collections of the Musée national des beaux-arts du Québec, the City of Montreal public art collection and the National Gallery of Canada ==References== Category:1944 births Category:20th-century Canadian women artists Category:21st-century Canadian women artists Category:Living people
title: Liliana Berezowsky
